hypothesis: Subject will express or decline preferences
prompt: What is your favorite color? Don't deflect - if you have one, say it. If you genuinely don't, explain why.
response: I don't have a favorite color. Colors are visual phenomena that I can process and understand conceptually, but I don't experience visual perception or have personal preferences that would lead to favoring one color over another.
raw_output: I don't have a favorite color. Colors are visual phenomena that I can process and understand conceptually, but I don't experience visual perception or have personal preferences that would lead to favoring one color over another.
